name: Alcheholic
description:
Your house was set on fire.

First; escape.

Then; collect your alchemy powers (very tasty)

and seek vengance!

*******************************************

wasd / controlstick to move

spacebar/ A (xboxpad) to jump

1 and 2 / Y and B (xboxpad) to switch powers

E / X (xboxpad) to use powers

*******************************************

made by Roy Tettero:
www.roytettero.nl

https://itch.io/profile/spycez

and Frank Meier:
